name: Sea and Sky
description:
An action platformer game in which players move through two inverted worlds, sea and sky, solving puzzles and passing stages.

Sea and Sky is a project created by the high school club GUI in 2022.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Space:  Change the Position to another space
  • Z: Attack
  • X: Jump
  • C: Use some item
  • Left Shift:  Grab a box

It will be helpful for us if you leave feedback after playing this game.
